name.name: Functional organization of the mouse lemur Primate Microcebus murinus : from multilevel validation to comparison with humans

software.description:
Brain network organization in the mouse lemur (Microcebus murinus) Primate.
Archives contain:

- Raw anatomical and resting-state functional MR images recorded from 14 mouse lemurs at 11.7 Tesla (2 time point per animal).

- A functional atlas of the mouse lemur brain (48 cerebral regions) issued from resting fMRI.

- A functional atlas of human brains (56 cerebral regions) issued from resting state fMRI data recorded from 42 healthy humans ranging from 41 to 60 years old at 3.0 Tesla.

- Dictionary learning analysis in mouse lemurs and humans showing 6 cerebral networks identified in these two species.
software.maintainer: Commissariat à l'énergie atomique et aux énergies alternatives
